description: Toosaka Aoi is the mother of http://anidb.net/ch35637 [Toosaka Rin] and http://anidb.net/ch35638 [Matou Sakura], and a childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch25943 [Matou Kariya]. Though she is devastated by her husband http://anidb.net/ch25942 [Toosaka Tokiomi]`s permit for http://anidb.net/ch37277 [Matou Zouken] to adopt Sakura away from them, she quietly accepts the choice, as the wife of a magus has no say in decisions taken by the family head.
name: Toosaka Aoi
